Credential.Description: This is some text that describes my credential.

AccreditedBy.Name: Council on Social Work Education (CSWE)
AccreditedBy.Description: Founded in 1952, the Council on Social Work Education (CSWE) is the national association representing social work education in the United States.

AssertedBy.Name: A QA Organization
AssertedBy.Description: An optional but useful description of this QA organization.

EstimatedCost.Description: A required description of the cost profile

CostItems.PaymentPattern: Full amount due at time of registration

OccupationType.Name: Information Security Analysts
OccupationType.Description: Plan, implement, upgrade, or monitor security measures for the protection of computer networks and information. May ensure appropriate security controls are in place that will safeguard digital files and vital electronic infrastructure. May respond to computer security breaches and viruses.

OccupationType.Name: Computer Network Support Specialists
OccupationType.Description: Plan, implement, upgrade, or monitor security measures for the protection of computer networks and information. May ensure appropriate security controls are in place that will safeguard digital files and vital electronic infrastructure. May respond to computer security breaches and viruses.

IndustryType.FrameworkName: NAICS - North American Industry Classification System
IndustryType.Name: National Security
IndustryType.Description: This industry comprises government establishments of the Armed Forces, including the National Guard, primarily engaged in national security and related activities.

IndustryType.FrameworkName: NAICS - North American Industry Classification System
IndustryType.Name: Regulation and Administration of Transportation Programs
IndustryType.Description: This industry comprises government establishments primarily engaged in the administration, regulation, licensing, planning, inspection, and investigation of transportation services and facilities. Included in this industry are government establishments responsible for motor vehicle and operator licensing, the Coast Guard (except the Coast Guard Academy), and parking authorities.

InstructionalProgramType.Name: Medieval and Renaissance Studies
InstructionalProgramType.Description: A program that focuses on the  study of the Medieval and/or Renaissance periods in European and circum-Mediterranean history from the perspective of various disciplines in the humanities and social sciences, including history and archeology, as well as studies of period art and music.

InstructionalProgramType.Name: Classical, Ancient Mediterranean and Near Eastern Studies and Archaeology
InstructionalProgramType.Description: A program that focuses on the cultures, environment, and history of the ancient Near East, Europe, and the Mediterranean basin from the perspective of the humanities and social sciences, including archaeology.

Requires.Description: To earn this credential the following conditions must be met, and the target learning opportunity must be completed.

TargetLearningOpportunity.Name: Another required learning opportunity (external)
TargetLearningOpportunity.Description: A required learning opportunity that has not been published to Credential Registry. The type, name, and subject webpage are required. The description while useful is optional.

IsPreparationFor.Description: This certification will prepare a student for the target credential

PreparationFrom.Description: This credential will prepare a student for this credential
